channel.title: Homes on Satyam
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Satyam

item.description: Biography I am Satyam Kumar, currently working as a visiting researcher on adaptive Riemannian classifiers for EEG signals in POTIOC team at INRIA, Bordeaux under the supervision of Fabien Lotte and Prof. Florian Yger. My interest is to decode the information content of neural signals and further its use in Brain-computer interfaces (BCI). I worked under supervison of Prof. Laxmidhar Behera for my master’s thesis on Motor Imagery BCI. In summer 2016, I was fortunate enough to receive Charpak Scholarship for research internship under Prof.
